ns2:test-suite.name: User messages handling in "Agent" tenant mode

step.title: When User enter account balance into widget input field

step.title: Then Agent has new conversation request

step.title: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch

step.title: Then Conversation area becomes active with account balance user's message

test-case.name: Verify if suggestion are shown in "Agent" mode
test-case.title: Verify if suggestion are shown in "Agent" mode

step.name: Given AGENT_ASSISTANT tenant feature is set to true for Automation
step.title: Given AGENT_ASSISTANT tenant feature is set to true for Automation

step.name: Given I login as agent of Automation
step.title: Given I login as agent of Automation

step.name: Given User select Automation tenant
step.title: Given User select Automation tenant

step.name: And Click chat icon
step.title: And Click chat icon

step.name: When User enter what is your open hours into widget input field
step.title: When User enter what is your open hours into widget input field

step.name: Then Agent has new conversation request
step.title: Then Agent has new conversation request

step.name: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch
step.title: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch

step.name: Then Conversation area becomes active with what is your open hours user's message
step.title: Then Conversation area becomes active with what is your open hours user's message

step.name: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "what is your open hours"
step.title: Then There is correct suggestion shown on user message "what is your open hours"

step.name: And The suggestion for user message "what is your open hours" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field
step.title: And The suggestion for user message "what is your open hours" with the biggest confidence is added to the input field

step.name: And Agent is able to delete the suggestion from input field and sends his own "thanks for asking" message
step.title: And Agent is able to delete the suggestion from input field and sends his own "thanks for asking" message

step.name: Then User have to receive 'thanks for asking' text response for his 'what is your open hours' input
step.title: Then User have to receive 'thanks for asking' text response for his 'what is your open hours' input
